usa: Cleveland is inaugurated President for a second term.
The Sherman Silver Purchase Act is repealed.
australia: The Corowa Conference (the "people's convention") called on the colonial parliaments to pass enabling acts, allowing the election of delegates to a new constitutional convention aimed at drafting a proposal and putting it to a referendum in each colony.
afgan: Abdur Rahman and British Raj representative Mortimer Durand signed an agreement establishing the Durand Line.
